name.description: Specifies the name of the Container Registry. Changing this forces a new resource to be created.

resource_group_name.description: The name of the resource group in which to create the Container Registry. Changing this forces a new resource to be created.

location.description: Specifies the supported Azure location where the resource exists. Changing this forces a new resource to be created.

admin_enabled.description: Specifies whether the admin user is enabled. Defaults to `false`.

storage_account_id.description: The ID of a Storage Account which must be located in the same Azure Region as the Container Registry.

sku.description: The SKU name of the container registry. Possible values are  `Basic`, `Standard` and `Premium`. `Classic` (which was previously `Basic`

tags.description: A mapping of tags to assign to the resource.

georeplication_locations.description: A list of Azure locations where the container registry should be geo-replicated.

default_action.description: The behaviour for requests matching no rules. Either `Allow` or `Deny`. Defaults to `Allow`

ip_rule.description: One or more `ip_rule` blocks as defined below.

virtual_network.description: One or more `virtual_network` blocks as defined below.

action.description: The behaviour for requests matching this rule. At this time the only supported value is `Allow`

ip_range.description: The CIDR block from which requests will match the rule.

subnet_id.description: The subnet id from which requests will match the rule.

id.description: The ID of the Container Registry.

login_server.description: The URL that can be used to log into the container registry.

admin_username.description: The Username associated with the Container Registry Admin account

admin_password.description: The Password associated with the Container Registry Admin account

create.description: Used when creating the Container Registry.

update.description: Used when updating the Container Registry.

read.description: Used when retrieving the Container Registry.

delete.description: Used when deleting the Container Registry.
